content.description: A student writes the following information for a process that involves a fixed quantity of ideal gas.
content.question: W = −PΔVΔU = Q + WP = 2.0x105 PaΔV = - 2.0x10-3 m3ΔU = - 600JWhich of the following descriptions best represents the process?

choices.label: The gas expands at a constant pressure of 200 kPa.
The gas is cooled at constant volume until its pressure falls to 200 kPa.
The gas is compressed at a constant pressure of 200 kPa.
The gas is heated and its pressure increases at constant volume.

content.answer: The gas is compressed at a constant pressure of 200 kPa.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
